title: Mathematical Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program via Online Active Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A course for corporate managers/leaders to strengthen their competency in applying mathematics to solve real-world business problems

learning_goals: Learners can design a mathematical model based on real business scenarios to produce project deliverables
Learners can share mathematical problem-solving processes and provide feedback with peers using collaboration tools
Learners can enhance argumentative writing skills to explain mathematical concepts in online discussion boards/video conferences

resources: Real-world workplace data samples from enterprises

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
